column2: It is dark here in the forest.
column3: It is dark here in the forest.

column2: The moss is soft and warm.
column3: The moss is soft and warm.

column2: We have no bed now, save the moss, and no future, save the beasts.
column3: We have no bed now, save the moss, and no future, save the beasts.

column2: No men stopped us at the gate.
column3: No men stopped us at the gate.

column2: It is true that our tunic was torn and stained with brown stains which had been blood. We raised our right arm and we said:
column3: It is true that our tunic was torn and stained with brown stains which had been blood. We raised our right arm and we said:

column2: Who are you, our brother?	Who are you, our brother?
For you do not look like a Scholar."
column3: For you do not look like a Scholar."

column2: Then it was as if a great wind had stricken the hall, for all the Scholars spoke at once, and they were angry and frightened.
column3: Then it was as if a great wind had stricken the hall, for all the Scholars spoke at once, and they were angry and frightened.

column2: A Street Sweeper!	A Street Sweeper!
It is against all the rules and all the laws!"
column3: It is against all the rules and all the laws!"

column2: We spoke of it, and of our long quest, and of our tunnel, and of our escape from the Palace of Corrective Detention.
column3: We spoke of it, and of our long quest, and of our tunnel, and of our escape from the Palace of Corrective Detention.

column2: Then we put the wires to the box, and they all bent forward and sat still, watching.
column3: Then we put the wires to the box, and they all bent forward and sat still, watching.

column2: And slowly, slowly as a flush of blood, a red flame trembled in the wire. Then the wire glowed.
column3: And slowly, slowly as a flush of blood, a red flame trembled in the wire. Then the wire glowed.

column2: But terror struck the men of the Council.
column3: But terror struck the men of the Council.

column2: It is yours.
column3: It is yours.

column2: We give it to you."
column3: We give it to you."

column2: Still they would not move.
column3: Still they would not move.

column2: But they looked upon us, and suddenly we were afraid.
column3: But they looked upon us, and suddenly we were afraid.

column2: They moved to the table and the others followed.
column3: They moved to the table and the others followed.

column2: We do not care.
column3: We do not care.

column2: But the light?
column3: But the light?

column2: What will you do with the light?"
column3: What will you do with the light?"

column2: We cannot alter the Plans again so soon."
column3: We cannot alter the Plans again so soon."

column2: It must be destroyed!
column3: It must be destroyed!

column2: You fools! we cried.
column3: You fools! we cried.

column2: You thrice-damned fools!"
column3: You thrice damned fools!"

column2: We fell, but we never let the box fall from our hands.
column3: We fell, but we never let the box fall from our hands.

column2: And the road seemed not to be flat before us, but as if it were leaping up to meet us, and we waited for the earth to rise and strike us in the face.
column3: And the road seemed not to be flat before us, but as if it were leaping up to meet us, and we waited for the earth to rise and strike us in the face.

column2: But we ran.
column3: But we ran.

column2: Then we knew.
column3: Then we knew.

column2: We were in the Uncharted Forest.
column3: We were in the Uncharted Forest.

column2: We crawled to it, we fell upon it, our face in our arms, and we lay still.
column3: We crawled to it, we fell upon it, our face in our arms, and we lay still.

column2: We lay thus for a long time.
column3: We lay thus for a long time.

column2: Then we rose, we took our box and walked on into the forest.
column3: Then we rose, we took our box and walked on into the forest.

column2: It mattered not where we went.
column3: It mattered not where we went.

column2: We had nothing to fear from them. The forest disposes of its own victims.
column3: We had nothing to fear from them. The forest disposes of its own victims.

column2: So we walked on, our box in our arms, our heart empty.
column3: So we walked on, our box in our arms, our heart empty.

column2: Whatever days are left to us, we shall spend them alone. And we have heard of the corruption to be found in solitude.
column3: Whatever days are left to us, we shall spend them alone. And we have heard of the corruption to be found in solitude.

column2: We know these things, but we do not care.
column3: We know these things, but we do not care.

column2: We care for nothing on earth. We are tired.
column3: We care for nothing on earth. We are tired.

column2: We have not built this box for the good of our brothers.
column3: We have not built this box for the good of our brothers.

column2: We built it for its own sake.
column3: We built it for its own sake.

column2: Then a blow of pain struck us, our first and our only.
column3: Then a blow of pain struck us, our first and our only.

column2: We thought of the Golden One.
column3: We thought of the Golden One.

column2: It is best.
column3: It is best.
